comments.comment: Budunge named ape ghanasara Sw nidahas kala youtui sinhala budda rata k Tula un Wahanse kala Meheya apamanai mulu lokayama hela Dakinawa meveni aparada eknelugoda eki geniyakne chiwaraya ta Wada ekata tena dunne .mona aparadayakda ..ehenam mey rate wena mini merum balu takkadi weda karana unta  ko mey nitiya ape Sw kata karapu vachaneta .mey Taram  asadaranayak kale Ai .agama jatiya wenuwen tiyena ley kekkuma anith unta  nette Ai anagatha parapura wenuwen neda  munnanse mey satan karanne .kosol rajatuma wage aditara siHayek  Ai mey molagedi mewa terum novena kohewath yana geniyak ussala weda karanne .wahama ghanasara hamuduruwo nidahas karanna .chiwaraya arahath dhajaya ape api gawrawa kala youtthe budun wahanseta.loku lokkange awadanaya pinisai .
comments.author: nimasha lew

darmaya yana wachanaye sarala theruma darshanaya hewath dakmai...katholika ho muslim ho ewada darshanayan...baudda darshanaya hewath dakma gana yam pramanayakin oya dannawa athi aniwarnayen...chiwarayak porawa gaththama ‡∂∞‡∂ª‡∑ä‡∂∏‡∂∫‡∑ö  ‡∂±‡∑í‡∂Ø ‡∑É‡∑î‡∂±‡∂ö‡∑í nam...adahas kale baudda darshanaya nam samawela mehema hithanna...man pawidi wela chiwarayak daragena sitinnek...man pranagathayak karanawa...man oyage thaththawa gathanaya kala kiyala hithanna...oya chande dena deshapalana pakshaya wenuwenmai ka gahanneth...dan oya mata maithriya karanawada???dana gahala garu karanawada???naththam
